title: [bug] Blurry installer on Windows

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

Currently the Windows installer generated by nsis is blurry when system scale is set to not 100%/200%

System scale set to 125%

![image](https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/assets/68118705/31e88e27-fee3-4bef-a2d9-710c47ac9a3b)

We can fix it by adding `ManifestDPIAware true` to https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/blob/dev/tooling/bundler/src/bundle/windows/templates/installer.nsi

> https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Reference/ManifestDPIAware

![image](https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/assets/68118705/be81feef-c553-43ed-ad04-e2a3ebeceae8)
